name: Buying Back Bob's Heart
description:
Buying Back Bob's Heart

Help Bob buy his heart back so he can be free. Earn enough coins to buy Bob's heart back.

Instructions:

  • Sokoban style game
  • Gain coins as you move
  • Lose health as you move
  • Collect 200 coins to buy back the heart
  • [WASD] / Arrow Keys for movement
  • [T] to rewind back movements
  • Have fun!
